review: This is very cool.  We had to install it on the TV in the bedroom, because our main one in the family room is a Sony projection that won't work with the new stuff.  I keep hoping for it to die, but it works great, unfortunately.I am getting used to using the Fire TV; and will use it more after summer, since we are gone most of the summer.  I will update my review later.
author: Kindle Customer

review: Went from dish network to fire tv....best thing ever!!!!
author: Dylan Cokely

review: While browsing Meijer for Set top Boxes I was tossed between the Roku 3 and the Amazon Fire TV. While the Roku 3 looks nice, it doesn't nearly do half the features the Fire TV does for me. It can play games, specially if you have a gamefly streaming account, its a really nice feature! And Netflix works beautifully on it. Amazon Instant Video runs very smoothly and have had little to no issues with it! I love it! I bought a controller on amazon and plan on using it as a gaming device as well! I'll update my review once I try the game's!
author: Lorri

review: This is great, I should have gotten this a long time ago it would have saved me a lot of money that I wasted on cable. Love it.
author: Martha

review: I do like the quality of the Fire TV content from Amazon.  However, we cannot get the Netflix app to work.  Have tried all of the solutions listed online and no results.  May have to return the Fire TV since one of my main reasons for purchasing it was to stream Netflix.  Can anyone help with this? I have uninstalled and reinstalled the app, rebooted my modem, Fire TV, and router, updated the Fire TV and nothing seems to work.  HELP.
